message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. Is this a price you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've got to make a living, and I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $10200?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about we settle on $10800?
I'm getting close, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to go down to $10500?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $11200?
I'm still a bit away from where I'd like to be. Would you be willing to go down to $10000?
